data.question: What is the chemical formula of MOF-910?
What method was used for the structural elucidation of MOF-910?
Is MOF-910 thermally stable up to 320 °C?
What is the BET surface area of MOF-910 derived from the N2 adsorption isotherm?
Does the synthesis of MOF-910 involve a solvothermal method?
What is the role of triethylamine in the synthesis of MOF-910?
Is the linker PBCP fully deprotonated in the structure of MOF-910?
What is the crystal system of MOF-910?
Does MOF-910 exhibit permanent porosity?
What is the significance of the hysteresis loop in the N2 sorption isotherm of MOF-910?
data.answer: It likely results from interparticle voids present in the MOF-910 bulk powder sample.

data.question: What is the space group of MOF-910?
Does the linker PBCP undergo oxidation during the synthesis of MOF-910?
What analytical technique was used to verify the deprotonation of the ligating atoms in MOF-910?
What is the role of DMF in the synthesis of MOF-910?
Is the linker PBCP a heterotritopic linker?
What is the thermal decomposition temperature of MOF-910?
What is the lattice parameter 'a' of MOF-910?
Does MOF-910 maintain its crystallinity after suspension in various solvents?
What is the calculated pore size distribution of MOF-910?
data.answer: Matches the van der Waals pore diameter of 21 Å

data.question: What is the chemical stability of MOF-910 in different pH conditions?
data.answer: It maintains crystallinity in pH 4, pH 7, and pH 8 aqueous solutions.
